subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Security and Warning Systems
organizations: Billie Jean King National Tennis Center
lead_paragraph: Security measures led to long waits at the United States Open on Monday. Tennis officials promised better direction at the gates, which will also open earlier on Tuesday: 9:30 a.m.
snippet: Security measures led to long waits at the United States Open on Monday. Tennis officials promised better direction at the gates, which will also open earlier on Tuesday: 9:30 a.m.
